binary.name: meteor_proc
binary.syntax: meteor_proc -old [-vb] [-hr hr] [-mv maxvel] [-mw maxwidth] [-ms minsn] [-me maxerr] [-mr maxrange] [-bm vmbeam] [-mb minbeam] [-mz meridional/zonal] fitnames

option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
beam number for the meridional wind velocity.
minimum number of beams to accept during fitting.
wind component to record meridional or zonal.
use the Chisham virtual height model.
filenames of the fitacf format files.
the input file is in the fit format.
filenames of the fit format files.
the input file is in the cfit format.
filenames of the cfit format files.

description.p: The result is written to standard output.
